verbs.description: SPRINGDALE ( KFSM ) -- [ARG0: A rally] to [V: protest] [ARG1: the separation of families at the U.S. border] took place at George Park in Springdale today ( June 19 . ) The rally centered around the Trump administrations " zero tolerance policy , " and was hosted by Democrat Josh Mahoney who 's running against Congressman ...
